suite.name: Robot Framework test run with a Postman Newman Collection running one Postman Folder at a time in serial

test.name: POSTMAN NEWMAN COLLECTION EXAMPLE PART ONE : Send a POST request to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts and check the response.

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

arguments.arg: newman run ${PATH}//jsonplaceholder.typicode.com.postman_collection.json --folder 'Send POST to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com' --reporter-cli-no-summary --color off --reporter-cli-no-console

kw.msg: Starting process: newman run /rfw//Tests//Part-One--RFW-Strategies-For-Rapidly-Testing-And-Adapting-To-Frequently-Changing-Projects//Resources//jsonplaceholder.typicode.com.postman_collection.json --folder 'Send POST to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com' --reporter-cli-no-summary --color off --reporter-cli-no-console
Waiting for process to complete.
Process completed.

kw.name: Get Process Result
kw.doc: Returns the specified `result object` or some of its attributes.
kw.msg:
${POSTMAN_POST_RESPONSE} = newman
jsonplaceholder.typicode.com
→ Send POST to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com POST https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts [201 Created, 822B, 722ms]

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

newman

suite.doc: In a hypothetical scenario, where you are split between 3 or more frequently changing projects. Several of them are maybe, days, weeks or months past their delivery date. You are brought in to quickly learn everything about the project and set up basic regression tests touching all of the high risk areas, running in the CI pipeline in less than 10 working days (ideally they want it in probably 5 days or less). This might be a situation where people are relying on various types of tools to test things out and quickly explore system behavior, maybe all of the developers like using Postman (with Newman) and are sharing a single Postman Collection that keeps growing bigger every day. This example is enhanced in Part Two...

stat.name: Robot Framework test run with a Postman Newman Collection running one Postman Folder at a time in serial

suite.stat: Robot Framework test run with a Postman Newman Collection running one Postman Folder at a time in serial
